title: Kha'zix Q animation speed is faster on PBE is this a bug or will be added to Live also?
body:
I was testing the new Kha death blossom skin on PBE today and noticed that the Q animation is way faster and way smoother, is this going to Live? This change is so strong for Kha'zix for so many reasons and it's the right buff he was looking for for a long time now. It makes his combo smoother and rewards people for being really fluent and good on the champion. 

Would love some feedback to confirm if this is going live or not thanks ! :)

replies.body: Kha'Zix is a bug, yes.
I really hope this goes to live, he'll be in just the right spot. :--)

Sorry to disappoint, but no, that's not an intended change. We're looking into what's going on there now. 

As to why we don't think this is a good change that's because we don't want to constantly creep cast times/attack times quicker and quicker. We believe having some degree of telegraph/reaction time's important to give players time to react, allow proper visual/audio representation of gameplay and space out ability usage somewhat. Faster, snappier abilities will almost always feel better and, completely understandably, will always be requested. Feel's not the only consideration we think needs to be weighed here though, with pace of game (choice versus twitch reactions especially) also a really important value.

I can see instant casts being anti-fun because of other champions that have or would have instant casts would not have much counter-play if any, but khazix's Q has plenty of counter-play already and that would transfer to when he gets instant cast or close to instant cast Q. Other instant casts do not have isolation like chogath's ultimate. If cho's ult did have isolation there would be plenty of counter play because he can no longer flash insta kill you under tower or in a minion wave etc it all relies on your positioning and not reaction time. So stating that this would be poor because of reaction time makes no sense because it's more towards positioning. 

I'm not asking for it to be instant but close enough to instant where it feels rewarding to good kha players. Kha'zix's problem right now is that he does not feel rewarding to play and is clunky. Everything else is fine and from my experience (I can confidently say I know Kha the best and inside out) this is the exact change he needs to make him the rewarding fast paced squishy assassin that everyone wants. I've tested the changes plenty on PBE and I know from experience that this change would not put him over the top and would put him where no more complaints and or changes would be needed. 

I would love to discuss in some sort of instant chat system so everything can be discussed between me and Riot, I want to get all my points across in one discussion. Thanks so much for responding though would love a fast response and maybe talk more in a live chat system? Just to get everything clear.

Currently when you Q someone walking into a bush or flashing away, it's 50/50. Sometimes you hear and see the animation go off and nothing happens, other times it does actually connect. 

Other champs already have instant moves with no counter play outside of bating it.

Kha also does not instantly blink on top and Q someone. He has to get into range which requires an E, R, really good positioning, team coordination, etc. All of those have counter play between sweepers, vision skills like Lee Sins Q, CC, etc. 

The lag on an already casted Q in melee range doesn't make much since. If I see and hear the move go off, it should register. If not, then remove the ambiguity please, because it is very frustrating to rely on random factors when playing a champ that is already considered underpowered (unless extremely fed).
